name: The Chosen One (Q34)
description:
Made in 1 week for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

Theme: It is not real

(It's my first time taking part in a game jam and I overscoped a bit, so the game might feel a little unpolished, sorry)

Wake up, Teo...

Follow the white rabbit to discover the truth about the world you live in.

(The plot is highly inspired by Matrix)

Controls:

Move - AWSD

Aim - Mouse Cursor

Shoot - Left Click

Pause game - P
